review: Fire TV Stick is amazing!I thought Apple TV was great; Fire TV Stick is even better!The installation was easy. The remote control works smoothly. The selections are similar but different from Apple TV, so having both is an excellent choice. The price is about one third the cost of Apple TV ($35 vs $100).If you are a Prime subscriber, Fire TV movies are free. You can watch all the TV & movies you want. You really don't need cable TV anymore. Cut cable loose & save your money.The screensaver pictures are outstanding & pleasing to watch.Apple has some catching up to do.
author: Donald Dustin "dsquared"
